title: Irish Rose
description: Cabbage Rose: Ambassador of LoveBurke Logan had traveled to a small Irish village to buy horses, and found a spirited filly he refused to leave withoutâ€”a freckled, fiery-haired beauty by the name of Erin McKinnon... The rough and rugged stable owner offered her a job in America, and Erin bid goodbye to Skibbereen. She would keep his books in order, but how would she keep her heart from breaking?
author: Nora Roberts
